Description: Creates a button in the performance view.
Creates a file selector in the performance view.
Creates a text or image label in the performance view.
Arg1 Description: The width of the label in grid units (1 to 6)
Arg2 Description: The height of the label in grid units (1 to 16)

Description: Creates a knob in the performance view.
Arg1 Description: The minimum value of the knob.
Arg2 Description: The maximum value of the knob.
Arg3 Description: The knob value is divided by <display-ratio> for display purposes.

Description: Creates a level meter in the performance view.
Creates a drop-down menu in the performance view.
Creates a mouse area in the performance view.
Creates a panel for grouping widgets in the performance view.
Creates a slider in the performance view.
Arg1 Description: The minimum value of the slider.
Arg2 Description: The maximum value of the slider.

Description: Creates a switch in the performance view.
Creates a table in the performance view.
Arg1 Description: The width of the table in grid units (1 ... 6).
Arg2 Description: The height of the table in grid units (1 ... 16).
Arg3 Description: The range of the table. If negative values are used, a bipolar table is created.

Description: Creates a text edit field in the performance view.
Creates a value edit field (number box) in the performance view.
Arg1 Description: The minimum value of the value edit.
Arg2 Description: The maximum value of the value edit.
Arg3 Description: The value is divided by <display-ratio> for display purposes.

Description: Creates a waveform display for displaying samples and optionally their slices. This widget can also be used to control specific parameters per slice and for MIDI drag and drop functionality.
Arg1 Description: The width of the waveform in grid units (1 ... 6).
Arg2 Description: The height of the waveform in grid units (1 ... 16).

Description: Creates a wavetable display in the performance view, visualizing the state of a zone which is used as a wavetable.
Creates an XY pad in the performance view.
